algorithm_technique: 1-D DP: iterate through grid, updating path counts considering obstacles.
problem_summary_simple: Find unique paths in a grid with obstacles, moving only right or down.
problem_summary_technical: 1D DP approach to count paths on an m x n grid with obstacles, updating counts based on previous cells and obstacles.
key_insights: Obstacles block paths, setting the number of ways to reach that cell to 0.
The DP state `ways[j]` represents the number of ways to reach cell `(i, j)`.
If `obstacleGrid[i][j]` is 1, `ways[j]` becomes 0, and subsequent calculations for `ways[j]` will be affected.
